website_summaries.verdict: With its durable outer shell, multiple connectivity options, and wide range of sound, the Logitech Wireless Speaker Z515 makes a great sidekick for your next backyard barbecue or picnic party. However, if portability isn't your primary concern, you can trade size for sound quality with the Creative D100, another Bluetooth speaker that costs less than the Logitech.
pros: Includes wireless USB adapter and Bluetooth connectivity
cons: can't use it as a speakerphone
Creative D100 has bigger drivers and four color options

customer_reviews.title: I use it with my smartphone.  Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I use the Z515 speakers to play audiobooks from my Note 4 Samsung smart phone using its bluetooth connectivity. The performance is outstanding!! Many reviewers critique the sound quality compared to that of a laptop. Whatever! Most modern laptops have good to excellent audio to begin with so what is the point? In my opinion, the Logitech speaker audio is far better than any smartphone I've ever heard. So, when paired with a phone or tablet, the audio is a vast improvement. I especially enjoy using it when traveling. It is sleek enough to pack in my overnight bag. I can easily use it in my hotel room or in my vehicle. I recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricko454

customer_reviews.title: Small, tinny sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speakers because the speakers on my iPad were too poor quality to play music. Everything came out sounding like an am/fm radio. I was looking for reasonably priced speakers (check) that could be used without being plugged in to a power source (check) or connected to my iPad (check) and sounded good (oops.) These speakers are just as bad as the speakers on my iPad. The music still sounds tinny and poor quality, and the only difference is that the tinny scratch music is louder coming out of the logitech speakers. I am returning these and looking for something else.
customer_reviews.author: TZ

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Logitech has a good reputation, and I bought this speaker for 2 reasons: the sound from my laptop was too soft, and I wanted to use it as part of my piano lessons to provide students with ear-training games. Although the rechargeable battery was supposed to last several hours, I would have to recharge it after 1/2 hr of use. Then last month it quit working completely (I've had it 5 months, after a total of probably 20 hrs. of use). It's too late to return it to Amazon, and I'm sure that Logitech won't back it up. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 day
customer_reviews.text: I usually have great luck with Logitech products. But this particular item was a disappointment. Initial setup was flawless and sound was good. After about 1 day, all sound stopped. Tried all the resets and retries recommended by Logitech, but no help. There are many instances of this happening with this model on the Logitech Forum website. I think there is a small percentage that are affected, but I decided to go with a Jawbone Jambox. I returned to Amazon with absolutely no hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: I bought a refurbished one. with that said, It does not keep a charge for long, 2 hours at most before it needs to be recharged. I don't know if that's because it's refurbished or not. check a review for a new one to verify if the battery lasts any longer or do some research on it, wished I would have known to research it. I bought it for my desk top computer because I didn't want wires. buying this was a bad idea. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ShawnBoy

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I got this speaker for 2 months now and I use every time I go to beach or back yard BBQ from friend house. All my friend are very surprise when they heard the sound from this speaker and don't know where the music come from. I hide the iphone in my pocket lol. The bluetooth connection to my iphone and my Xoom are very easy. the speaker come with USB connection for PC don't have bluetooth. Good built and sound for the price. I recommend this speaker to any one who want to be wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Easiest setup I've ever experienced
customer_reviews.text: 1) Plug in the speaker's power (to charge the pre-installed batteries) 2) Plug in the USB adapter (no software prompts- drivers auto-installed) 3) Open Media Player 4) Play music Pros: - No issues, worked first time. - Worked with wi-fi and other Logitech wireless stuff (keyboard, mouse) (Win 7 64-bit) - Better range and sound quality than expected Cons: - USB key is about 2" long, and different from other Logitech wireless stuff (keyboard, mouse) - Doesn't look like there's an easy way to also have my wired mains running at the same time Out of the box to working as advertised in literally three minutes with better than expected range and quality. Winner.
customer_reviews.author: cassembler

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Wireless USB Speaker Z51
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech Wireless USB Speaker Z51 is a compact and versatile tool. I can plug it into my GPS, my mp3 player, my laptop, desktop- or any gadget with USB connection. I can leave the player in a safe place (like on the desk in the den) and still hear my music or radio show, e book or whatever out by the pool, Barbecue or picnic table. I have not had an issue so far about the wireless range of the product. And it has decent sound. It is not big booming surround sound but is still plenty loud and full range. I like it a lot. I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: susan tolene

customer_reviews.title: The little speaker than couldn't...
customer_reviews.text: While the speaker is very easy to set up and use, the quality leaves a lot to be desired, even at less than $100. I was playing music on my laptop using the wireless adapter and even though the speakers were less than 4 feet away, the music repeatedly dropped out - virtually every song, sometimes several times during one song. Not exactly what I was hoping for. The sound quality of the speakers was just okay, not great. They didn't seem much better than the external speakers you get with a desktop PC, but they were certainly better than the internal speakers in my laptop. I am going to return this. Back to researching speakers again ...
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth kept resetting
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was average. The biggest problem with the speaker is the blue tooth never worked properly. I would pair my phone with the speaker and use it. The next day, it showed the device on my phone but would not connect so I deleted the device and repaired and got the connection again. Same thing the following day. I tried 4 different devices and came up with the same result. I am returning and looking for another speaker.
customer_reviews.author: VirgoCritic

customer_reviews.title: sound distorts at higher levels
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of speakers hoping that they would be good for outdoor use. The problem is that they simply distort at higher volume levels and don't get very loud as it is. They also only pair with one thing at a time, so anytime you want to use it with something other than your ipod, like your phone, you must go through the pairing sequence again. Get instead the monster clarity or the jbl flip. They're much better for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: John Becknell

customer_reviews.title: idiot proof setup, excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: just recieved this logitech wireless speaker from Amazon Anyone should be able to use this wireless speaker. I plugged the charger into the wall and into the speaker turned the speaker on plug the transmitter into the usb port (must do this first) Select the media player. In my case it is a local radio station. connect to the listen live button and the sound comes onto to the wireless speaker. Also worked well with Windows media player. Excellent sound.
customer_reviews.author: Unklray

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with MacBook Pro - Poor support
customer_reviews.text: I have had these speakers since May 2012 and they work great with the ipad, however when I try to use them with my MacBook Pro I cannot ever seem to get them to work. I contacted the support department and they tell you all over what the instructions tell you. So at this point they will only operate with the ipad. I noticed on some discussion groups there is a problem getting these speakers to with the laptop. I hope there newer ones are better.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace E. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Z515
customer_reviews.text: This works just like I hoped it would.The sound quality is not perfect, but pretty good for a wireless speaker. I did not get the advertised 50 ft distance, but that was not too important to me for my purposes. With a window (patio door) between me and the computer, I began to lose signat at about 25-30 feet. I would recommend this to someone hoping to play playlists away from the connected computer. I also like the solid feel of quality with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Wrk33n

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.text: I short listed jambox and Logitech z515 and decided to buy z515. The sound quality is above average, though base seems to be higher but can be adjusted using equalizers on players. And once adjusted, it sounds better. Volume is awesome and it seems as if coming from a larger speaker. Pairing is easy and have got it working with almost all Bluetooth devices (of course last 5 devices). Build quality is also good and buttons have nice feel to them.
customer_reviews.author: AmitSharma

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my Hubby's cheap corded speakers.. we hated dealing with the cords and being tied to one spot because of them. Also the sound quality was no better than the speakers on our laptop. These babies are truly loud and awesome speakers. Its like a mini loud speaker, so good! I would buy a second one if it wasn't for being on a budget.. worth what I paid for, that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Tonks Plum

customer_reviews.title: I love this speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bluetooth speaker to connect to my new ViewPad 7. I spent a long time searching and bought the Logitech Wireless USB Speaker Z515. I was afraid I was going to be disappointed, but I wasn't. IT'S A GREAT SPEAKER! I use the USB adapter when I'm using my laptop and it really is "plug and play". Mostly I use it to listen to music in my car. It pairs up easily with my ViewPad and the sound quality greatly exceeds my expectations. The rechargeable battery last about 10 hours, which is fine with me. I only have to recharge it once a week. I couldn't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan D. Mann

customer_reviews.title: great portable speaker, works with my non Bluetooth laptop
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. It works with my computer, and I can carry it around the house. It has great sound, and I think it would probably work with a TV with a USB input. I can go about 40 feet in my apartment, and it will pick up upstairs with my computer downstairs, and also outside. I wish it had a handle, but otherwise it's great. Amazing sound, volume and versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Moonlight

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker.
customer_reviews.text: It was a little confusing how to setup the bluetooth connectivity with my iPhone and iPad but after I figured that out the speaker is working great for me. I also keep the 3.5mm Aux input jack plugged into my computer when I am home so that I dont have to keep two sets of speakers on my desk. Sound quality is great! I love that I can use the speaker over bluetooth while it is plugged in and will probably keep it plugged in 99% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: doctorvood

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: Look, this is not a stereo system, it is an amplified stereo speaker - it won't blast you out of the room - BUT, if you want a convenient way to hear your music or movies being played on your phone, computer or tablet, get this. It keeps a good charge, pairs easily, and sounds good. I'd compare its sound quality to a nice set of wired computer speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Boo...
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased for my father and step-mother so they can stream music from the computer to it. It worked well initially, but stopped in less than a year. I purchased the replacement battery and though it connects to the iPad, the connections lasts about 20 seconds. REALLY REALLY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Quick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who wants to hear music wherever she is working around the house. She even takes it outside. It was simple to operate right out of the box. You just plug in the transmitter to your USB port on your computer, or use the wire for your IPhone etc, and it plays whatever you have through the speaker. You can get some distortion if you try to go through several walls, but just move the computer closer. Overall, a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Logitech wireless USB speaker I have purchased. My husband and I enjoy the convenience of the unit with great sound and versatility. When my oldest daughter was visiting, she notice how neat it was and requested one for her birthday. Now we both are enjoying portable sound - love listening to Pandora!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Markow

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and fit. The sound is very good and the it holds a charge well. The Bluetooth works well. If your looking for a big sound, this is not the unit for you. Great for the beach and the park though! I got mine for 70 bucks new a couple of years back. I would recommended to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: mart4

customer_reviews.title: very convenient
customer_reviews.text: If you like Pandora or listening to other things like inspiration speeches or whatever, my wife loves to just plug the USB stick into the PC, and carry this around the house wherever she is working or exercising or whatever. makes for very great convenience. good sound quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small speaker which connected by bluetooth to various devices and this one fits the bill perfectly. Granted it's not Bose quality but for the price it sounds great. I have connected it by bluetooth to my Dell laptop, Acer tablet and Motorola Atrix 2 phone. My Creative MP3 player connects with a 3.5mm cable. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Fine on bluetooth not when plugged into source
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this unit and was pretty happy with the sound, but after having it a week or two I plugged into my Kindle to watch TV shows and found that the sound would drop out after sometime. I tried multiple cables as well as different units (cell phones) and when plugged in the sound dropped out after 15-30 minutes. Unplugging unit and plugging back in would fix but doing that every 15-30 minutes is a pain. Sent back and trying -
customer_reviews.author: Terri J. Smythe

customer_reviews.title: Great little speakers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a summer party and it didn't disappoint. Easily connected to iPad to project music, can move about the house and yard. Compact but nice sound; case is handy as well. Arrived earlier than expected so we had time to test it out before the Summer Solstice Party. My 7 year old uses it as we'll--hey, any trick to get her to clean her room!
customer_reviews.author: DEBORAH

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these as a gift for my brother, and he loved it, so I bought one for myself too. The sound quality is great as far as I'm concerned (I'm not an audiophile) and it is portable enough to easily take it with me wherever I go. The battery lasts about 8 hours on a full charge. I have only had it for about 2 months, but I haven't had any battery issues. If I do, I'll post another review.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I now wish I had ordered a unit with built-in Bluetooth, but for what it is, it does the job. It has good range away from the device driving it, decent sound, and plays for several hours on battery power alone.
customer_reviews.author: GreggM

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sounding and Good Audio Level +plus Hours of Listening
customer_reviews.text: Great addition for a Sony Google-TV Box Sony [NSZ-GS7] for listening to Internet Radio 'Audio' only with the TV Off. Smart-TV is in the Kitchen with the wireless {Bluetooth} Speaker out on the Sun Deck. Easy set-up {Bluetooth 'Pairing'} and good range ~30 Feet.
customer_reviews.author: R H F

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker system for the iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I bought the speakers based on the overwhelmingly positive reviews, and I haven't been disappionted so far. Great sound for the money, easy to set up, and love the portability. No complaints but I think you shouldn't pay more than $65 for the speaker. It comes with a bag to carry the speakers, which works okay, but it would be nice to have something with a little more quality - better padding, for example. I would also make the plugs on the charger folding so the charger fits into the bag a little better. Good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as previous logitech iPhone speaker
customer_reviews.text: Mediocre sound quality. We had a Logitech iPhone speaker dock that sounded much better. This is lighter, and more portable, but feels and sounds cheaper. Also wish it could pairs w/ more than one device at a time.
customer_reviews.author: el tomatillo

customer_reviews.title: over all good device
customer_reviews.text: This speaker over all is a good device though every once in a while it stops receiving the signal from the computer, and the program stops. Usually easy fix just shut the speaker down and then restart it again, that usually works. Over all the speaker works for me all over the house, including the basement and garage. It's not something you are going to rattle the windows with but it works well if you want some music or radio program in the background as you work.
customer_reviews.author: Josh V

customer_reviews.title: I don't even know if it works
customer_reviews.text: The plug that came with it is not an electric plug, at least not one that can be used in the United States . It has two round posts as opposed to the slats that plug into a socket in the US.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Remesch

customer_reviews.title: Good, portable set of speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Good: Great look, portable, rechargeable battery, easy to install with USB stick and easy wireless connection. Wireless range is great. Cons: Sound could be better, especially when you turn it up, wish it had some holes to give flexibility to mount on wall. The stand turns out to work well enough for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Ali H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really great sound for the price and size of the speaker. It packs well and works anywhere. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: reprac

customer_reviews.title: Small and convenient
customer_reviews.text: While searching for some good speakers to use wirelessly with my computer I saw the Logitech Z515 and bought it. I was reluctant at first but when I got it I have only good things to say about it. Of course it is not an explosive sound equipment, but it is sufficient for small apartment parties. If your computer doesn't have Bluetooth, it comes with a usb dongle (about the size of a pen drive) and you can set it up. It also has an Aux port in case you want to connect it that way (which is not mentioned anywhere, I believe).
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good sound. Nice size and shape. Easy to carry. Connect well with bluetooth. Easy buttons. Nice stand. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: YM

customer_reviews.title: Completely unacceptable
customer_reviews.text: After much research I settled on the Logitech Z515 wireless speaker. My needs were modest--I wanted to play music on my laptop and place the speaker less than 10 feet away in the cockpit of my boat. The sound quality was terrible--lots of static. Completely unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C. Kafer

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth stopped working after 2 and half months
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with this speaker, sound quality was excellent. I though it was a great value until the bluetooth stopped working after 2 and half months of use. The good old saying: you get what you paid for. :(
customer_reviews.author: Pjo04

customer_reviews.title: Compact and practical
customer_reviews.text: I have found the Logitect Wireless USB Speaker Z515 to be compact and practical, especially for me as a consultant who conduct Seminars and Presentations on a frequent basis at customer-arranged sites. I am particularly impressed with its quality of sound and range of reception. In fact I am thinking of purchasing a second unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Mapp

customer_reviews.title: Love the speaker, HOWEVER...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this speaker in January of 2012 and loved it so much I ordered another in February and still a huge fan. However, I placed a third order for the same speakers for friends (3 of them) and all three came in with European plugs. Amazon is working on this issue and I hope to have it resolved soon. Hope this review is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Great little wireless speaker for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the recipient loves it. he can take his music with him off his i pad and his i phone conveniently. Uses it everywhere. For the price the sound it good and it does the job. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bklyn shopper

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working. replacement stopped after 2 months. Logitech ...
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working. replacement stopped after 2 months. Logitech sent comprable but not wireless and they wouldn't let me pay extra to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: max berry

customer_reviews.title: Difficulty setting up without manual
customer_reviews.text: Still searching internet for set-up info. Can't seem to match it with my Vista laptop. Will re-review when successful. Any suggestions anyone? THis is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: V. M. Blais

customer_reviews.title: loud
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for christmas. Although it is refurbished you would never know. Attached to an ipod it gives loud clear music. Attahced to PC with usb dongle it is also clear and has great range.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice speakers
customer_reviews.text: I got these so I can watch videos on my laptop and I am very impressed. Not many new gadgets have made me so happy after I've plugged them in and turned them on. Bass is something a little lacking like everyone else says, but this is by far the coolest set of speakers i could hope to buy for the money. You will not be mad at this purchase, trust me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aceguy, Boston, MA

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: I use it and it works ok. This is just what the grand kids wanted and it was a good price and it got to me fast. Good Quality, and I'm glad I ordered it online.
customer_reviews.author: bisco

customer_reviews.title: Remote and mobile blue tooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: It sets up very easy, plug and play, haven't reached the outside reception area yet, and it will work remotely on its own battery.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Pieri

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! I live in a small apartment with few outlets (except at my desk) and I wanted a way to listen to music in my kitchen and my bathroom. This allows me to charge at my desk and then move the speaker around wherever I want in my apartment. It's not the absolute best sound quality, but it's pretty darn good. Note for Mac users (in OSX Lion): You will have to go into your sound preferences and choose a drop down menu for the Logitech speaker (this is after plugging in the USB).
customer_reviews.author: mrf

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Husband to listen to his favorite Internet radio station anywhere in or around the house. We can put this little speaker on our patio table or in the garage. The only drawback is if it has to go through too many walls you might not be able to get the connection. We love this little speaker and would recommend it to anyone who loves Internet radio or just listening to your music from your computer
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has great battery life and can function anywhere in my house even out in garage with computer inside on pandora. They are pretty loud but don't expect to throw a party with these little puppies. They were just want I wanted. Thumbs up! Both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Ryan

customer_reviews.title: works well - price effective
customer_reviews.text: This wireless speaker set is easy to set up and connect to bluetooth devices. I have a similar Bose device - and although the clarity is lesser than the more expensive Bose wireless speakers, it certainly is quite nice and adaquate for our use in small group voice over internet meetings. Very cost effective. It is so nice to not have the wires..... And, when not in use for meetings, Pandora sounds great on them.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Well built and Durable have had for about 3 years and it gets much use. Sound utility is pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless speaker
customer_reviews.text: Compact size yet solid case. Good sound for small size. Wireless sensitivity could be a tad better. Overall, worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Jean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and convenient speaker. Easy to use, either for your iPad, iPod or laptop. Good sound for a bedroom, bathroom or maybe your leaving room. Enjoy pandora or a radio station thru this speaker. Also, It comes with a bag in case you need to take it somewhere else. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Mao

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife. She loves it. she plays her itunes from her netbook to the speaker. works at a very good distance too. I would def buy again
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: didn't work
customer_reviews.text: The speaker did not work. I sent it back hoping it could be replaced. However, there were no more in stock, so I got a credit. I like dealing with Amazon
customer_reviews.author: frankie

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a wireless speaker that I could use to listen to music and movies on my computer or iPad. Well, this logitech speak is perfect for me. It is wireless and syncs up well with both devices. The volume level and quality is good and solid for my needs, but I could see how sound enthusiats would want more from this small, portable device. I give it five stars and I am listening to them right now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rashid

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Not For TV Use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker to use with my smart TV's audio apps. Discovered that it only works with computers and cell phones, so I was a little disappointed. Does work great through walls and when using outside of the house. Better volume and fidelity than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this so much I bought one for my Mom for Christmas...I take it everywhere, it syncs so easily even she can do it!! LOL great sound & great price!
customer_reviews.author: 6ofus

customer_reviews.title: Great little speakers.
customer_reviews.text: I use these all the time. I hope there is a way to replace the rechargeable batteries when they finally give out. I intend to use these speakers for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Salene

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Bought these while in the hospital recovering from a heart transplant. Was very disappointed with the quality of the sound and the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Eulipian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding speakers --- glad i caught them on sale ..:)
customer_reviews.author: Guwapo

customer_reviews.title: Frequent disconnections all the time
customer_reviews.text: This product would be perfect, but it disconnects constantly. Some days it runs completely fine, some days you're turning it off and on every five minutes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pryor

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, I wish it still sold widely. Only problem when the battery gets old it become useless. I tried installing a replacement battery to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Kinikya

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all
customer_reviews.text: The sound is not stable, always has popcorn nice all the time, the sound is so dull. Bad item and wrong decision. waste the money
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed with this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker for a good spacious room. The only thing I can say is that if you will do multiple connection to this speaker, you have to reconnect to each device whoever is going to use it. It doesn't save on this speaker but it is not a big deal for me because it is easy to connect.
customer_reviews.author: jologz

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek and compact
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an external speaker to boost our laptop speaker. We wanted something that was portable and didn't come with too many wires. Also, with kids in the house, we did not want something too heavy either. This speaker has met all these requirements. The sound quality is average (in fact, I found the sound quality of a Logitech Z205 better than this) but for the kind of music we listen to, this fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Magickrish

customer_reviews.title: Small speakers with big sound
customer_reviews.text: Small speakers with big sound. Works well with android phone and honeycomb tablet via bluetooth. I like the fact that there is a slot on the speakers to store the usb dongle(for PC use).
customer_reviews.author: A. King

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker
customer_reviews.text: The speaker sound was a little less than I expected but for the money portability and rechargeable battery it's a pretty good little speaker
customer_reviews.author: alan k

customer_reviews.title: Just what I've expected
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this speaker looking to replace my old wired pair of speakers connected to my desktop. I found it just perfect. Plus, I can take it around the house with me. Using the AC adaptor or the included battery I can have my desk free of some cables. The sound quality is fine for daily listening.
customer_reviews.author: Max Gosslar

customer_reviews.title: Mobile party!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeds my expectations, excellent range and big speaker sound! Use it outside of the house while the computer stays safely inside.
customer_reviews.author: Allan F. Hueg

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: You would be surprised by the amount of sound this little speaker can produce. Sleek... good looking. Sound quality is very good... but not excellent. Great package overall.
customer_reviews.author: karthik

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kept shorting out on me, right speaker failed before that after 2nd replacement gave up.
customer_reviews.author: David Trejo

customer_reviews.title: Easy and loud
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have a great sound and are easy to connect via wifi to any device your music is in.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for the price, so far it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Shirish Kadakia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I host seminars and these speakers are perfect for running videos and providing sound on my laptop! Great buy! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Butler

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This product is inferior for the amount of money that you pay for it. It distorts the sound at higher volume levels, and has issues connecting via blue tooth.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Goncharenko

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker enabled me to receive a radio station out in the living area of my home that I was only able to get on my computers internet.I did not however realize that if I use this speaker when I am listening to the radio station in the other part of my house that it turns the volume off on my computer. This is the only real downfall of this device. I truly enjoy it even though this is the case.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Would not charge when I first got it. I will send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kameron W.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult connection
customer_reviews.text: Had a difficult time connecting to speakers, first tech help made it sound like I needed bluetooth. Second tech help seemed to think I did and it sould have connected wiht "dongle" supplied. I had already bought the Bluetooth adapter and connected easly. Second tech help also said this was a first generation speaker that made me think that was part of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: mark sarver

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Product is good I have no problems with it, only thing u don't like is that it can't be connected to more than one device at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Dstar

customer_reviews.title: Wireless awesome
customer_reviews.text: Wish it could remembered multiple devices but an awesome speaker other than that it is awesome and I still have it after couple of years
customer_reviews.author: Patricio Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Really good item
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife and she told me that she is very happy with the way the item works.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Logitech speaker
customer_reviews.text: This sounds great, much better than my laptop speakers, which were horrible! The setup was very easy too. It works well fro my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker. Quality sound for such a small speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son and he loves it! Listens to music all the time and didn't want to have one that plugs in the computer. The one we had before the plug came apart in the computer which caused him to not be able to hear or use any type of speaker/headphones. Luckily we were able to get the piece out. Sound quality is excellent and loud!
customer_reviews.author: SharonS

customer_reviews.title: Speaker
customer_reviews.text: We used these speakers for presenters during a large conference we put on. Easy to set , use and most of all produce the sound you need. Would recommend them to anyone interested in purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up-Good value
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly. Easy set up. We were up and running in about 20 minutes. Great sound! Even my 84 year old mother can now hear the sound.
customer_reviews.author: BethMaine

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a way to listen to my IPad while at work but without a tangle of wires. The speaker picks up the Bluetooth signal without fail. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good stuff, works great!!
customer_reviews.text: This device works very well. Incredible sound in a litle box. Your cell or bluetooth device will sound much better.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Jimenez E

customer_reviews.title: portably nice
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I was looking for in a wireless speaker. The sound quality is what I expected after reading all the reviews. If I was looking for surround sound quality I would have purchased just that.The sound these speakers provide is clear and crisp with reasonable bass.I am very pleased with this purchase and would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: William Pelissier

customer_reviews.title: beautiful sound
customer_reviews.text: The speaker works well with our laptops during meetings and presentations. This was a great purchase. Our trainor loves it.
customer_reviews.author: USD-Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched and this was it! Compact. Quality. Bluetooth. Works with either my iPad or iPhone. Simple reprogram. Great!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Penn Jackson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: No battery required, good sound, great connectivity
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect too much from this wireless speaker for the cheap price. But using it I discovered and received more cause it can be used without AC cable and battery lasts hours (up to 5), the sound is clear and loud enough for a small set, and the connectivity is very friendly: easy bluetooth or USB setup, or direct wired fun.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: great speaker
customer_reviews.text: no instalation needed just rceharge the batteries plug in the USB adapter and voila; specialy for my laptop its perfect and great sound . i recomend it to anyone who wants good sound .
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Carbonneau

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Wireless USB Speaker Z515
customer_reviews.text: finally a affordable speaker that works so you can accually hear what your playing! now i have to give away all the others that dont.
customer_reviews.author: Leann Lawless

customer_reviews.title: Great little speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Love it for in the house, very adaptable and convenient. A cinch to set up, just plugged the adaptor into my laptop and I can play CDs, my iTunes and Pandora. Decent price, too. The only negative is that it doesn't seem to work outside. (Brick house? too far away?)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Logitech Wireless Speaker Z515
product_meta.description:
This wireless, rechargeable speaker gives you rich, full stereo sound from your laptop, iPad or iPhone - no strings attached. And its 10-hour rechargeable battery and travel case make it easy to bring your music with you.

Key Features:

Music in the air
Plug-and-play wireless lets you stream your music from anywhere in the room - up to 50 feet (15 m)* away from your laptop.High fidelity
Dual two-inch drivers let you hear every note the way it was meant to be heard.The beat goes on
A mobile music marathon - this portable speaker lets you listen to up to 10 hours** of music wherever you go.* Actual wireless range will vary with use, settings and environmental conditions.
** Actual battery life will vary with use, settings and environmental conditions. Rechargeable batteries have a limited number of charge cycles.
feature_bullets: soft travel case and user documentation.
